dialogue.htmlContent:
Having been eagerly anticipating your date with Nyan all day, you swiftly make your way to the address which she wrote down for you. The street on which she lives turns out to be far more upmarket than you expected, with each of the regency-styled residences which you pass being immaculately clean and well presented. Much to your surprise, there's even a demon Enforcer patrolling up and down the road, who keeps an eye on you as you approach Nyan's apartment building.

Walking up the steps to the front door, you see yet another sign of this area's affluence, as there's an arcane intercom system securely bolted to the wall. Looking over the half a dozen name plates, you see one which is labelled as 'Nyan [nyan.surname]', and you waste no time in pressing the little button beside it. After a loud buzz and a momentary pause, you hear the voice of your girlfriend call out over the intercom, [nyan.speechNoEffects(H-Hello? This is Ms. [nyan.surname], w-who is it?)]

After quickly telling her that it's you, Nyan lets out an excited squeak and quickly replies, [nyan.speechNoEffects([pc.Name]! C-Come on in! I'm on the second floor, p-please come on up!)]

Hearing a loud clicking noise from behind the front door, you experimentally push on it and discover that it's been unlocked. Doing as your girlfriend says, you cross the smartly-kept foyer and proceed up several flights of stairs to the second floor. As you reach your destination, you see that the cute cat-girl already has her apartment door open, and with a happy smile on her face, she exclaims, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I-It's good to see you, [pc.name]! W-What did you come here for?)]

[pc.Stepping] up to where your girlfriend is waiting, you tell her that you're here to collect her for your evening's date. As she hears you say this, Nyan's bright blue eyes light up, and she excitedly claps her hands together and exclaims, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Oh! Oh, how wonderful! C-Come on in, [pc.name], you can wait in my lounge while I g-get ready!)]

Stepping back into her apartment, your girlfriend holds the door open and beckons you inside...

[pc.Stepping] forwards, you enter the entrance hall to Nyan's apartment and let the cat-girl shut the door behind you. Happily skipping forwards, she calls out behind her, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Come on, the lounge is this way!)]

Following in your happy girlfriend's footsteps, you move forwards and take a right-hand turn, before [pc.walking] straight ahead down the carpeted hallway and entering her modestly-sized lounge. On one side of the room there are a couple of bookcases stacked full of books, while a coffee table and several plush sofas are arranged to be the room's focal point. A couple of windows are positioned on the far side of the room, and as Nyan leads you over to the nearest sofa, you see that they look down onto the courtyard behind the apartment building.

Moving the sofa's stack of colourful cushions aside in order to make a comfortable spot for you to sit down, your girlfriend practically skips in excitement as she retreats to the door and calls out, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I'm going to get changed! I-I won't be long, please make yourself comfortable!)]

With that, she darts out of the room, leaving you to do as she suggested and sit down on the comfortable sofa. Taking a cursory look around from your seated position, you notice that there are a couple of paintings on the wall which both depict idyllic countryside scenes. While there are several fashion and cookery magazines on the coffee table, you don't particularly feel like reading at the moment, and so soon find yourself standing up and walking around the room. Wandering past the bookcases, you see that almost every single one of the books on the shelves is some kind of romance novel.

[pc.Walking] over to the windows, you spend the next few minutes watching a centauress unloading a cart she'd been pulling. By the time she's finished stacking her crates up against one wall of the courtyard, you suddenly hear Nyan's footsteps approaching from down the hallway...

You turn to face the door just in time to see Nyan stepping back into the room. Instead of her usual skirt and blouse, she's now wearing [nyan.a_slotClothing(TORSO_UNDER, true)], with a colour-coordinated bow on her headband. For the first time, you see your girlfriend wearing a noticeable amount of makeup, and you can't help but instantly think how her red lipstick, black eye-liner, and light blue eye-shadow makes her look more attractive and alluring than ever before.

[pc.Stepping] over to where she's waiting, you compliment Nyan on how beautiful she looks, which causes her cheeks to turn a bright shade of red. Coyly shuffling her feet, she glances at you with her big, blue eyes and asks, [nyan.speechNoEffects(A-Are you ready to go?)]

Replying in the affirmative, you accompany the blushing cat-girl back into the hallway, where she pulls on #IF(game.getSeason()==SEASON_SUMMER) a stylish, tan-coloured coat and a pair of dark brown chelsea boots, before grabbing hold of a cute, frog-styled umbrella. #ELSE a stylish, tan-coloured coat, a black scarf, and a pair of dark brown thigh-high boots, before finally grabbing a cute, frog-styled umbrella. #ENDIF Flashing you a happy smile, she holds up the green umbrella and declares, [nyan.speechNoEffects(T-The weather seems to change at a moment's notice, so I a-always take this with me!)]

Telling Nyan what a good idea that is, you join her in exiting her apartment, before accompanying her down the stairs and towards the apartment building's front door...

#IF(game.getCurrentWeather()==WEATHER_MAGIC_STORM)

As you approach the exit, a bright pink light suddenly flashes through the windows, causing Nyan to let out a little eek and whine, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Oh no... There's an a-arcane storm! P-Perhaps if we wait for the thunder to pass, then run for the Arcade, w-we could make it?)]

Asking Nyan if she's sure that she wants to risk it, and receiving a rapid nod of her head in response, you wait for the next clap of thunder to pass before opening the door and hurrying down the steps with your girlfriend at your side. Clutching her little umbrella in her delicate hands, the cat-girl surprisingly proves to be an extremely capable runner. Her unexpected sprint proves to be very fortuitous, for the two of you manage to reach the doors of the Shopping Arcade without being subjected to a clap of arousing thunder.

Rushing through the entrance and shutting the doors after you, Nyan heavily pants, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Phew... We made it... I can't... believe that worked...)]

After giving your girlfriend some time in which to catch her breath, you accompany her down the wide, marble walkways of the Arcade, and soon arrive at your destination of the restaurant, 'The Oaken Glade'. Holding open the front door and allowing Nyan to step inside, you follow her through and are immediately met by a smartly-dressed otter-boy, who is quite clearly the establishment's ma√Ætre d'. Looking over at Nyan, he gives her a big, familiar smile, before slightly bowing his head and offering his enthusiastic greetings, [style.speechMasculine(Good evening, good evening! We have not seen you nor your mother for some time, Ms. [nyan.surname], but as ever, you are most welcome here. If you and your partner for this evening would care to follow me, I will show you to your seats. After all, we always have a table for you!)]

#ELSEIF(game.getCurrentWeather()==WEATHER_RAIN || game.getCurrentWeather()==WEATHER_SNOW)

As you approach the exit, you see through the windows that it's currently #IF(game.getCurrentWeather()==WEATHER_RAIN) raining outside. #ELSE snowing outside. #ENDIF With her cute frog-umbrella coming to the rescue, Nyan steps outside and pops it open, before shyly stuttering, [nyan.speechNoEffects(T-This is big enough for both of us... S-So we can w-walk close together and share it...)]

Thanking your girlfriend for her kindness, you do as she suggests and share the umbrella with her. Clearly being very happy at getting to share this moment with you, Nyan blushes and leans into you as you travel down the street. Unfortunately for her, however, this time together under her umbrella doesn't last long, as it only takes you five minutes to arrive at the doors of the Shopping Arcade.

#ELSE

As you approach the exit, you see through the windows that the weather outside isn't going to prove to be an issue. After holding open the door for your girlfriend, you accompany her down the steps and then proceed on your way down the street. Clearly being very excited about going out on a date with you, Nyan walks right by your side for the whole five minutes that it takes to get to the Shopping Arcade.

#ENDIF #IF(game.getCurrentWeather()!=WEATHER_MAGIC_STORM)

Heading inside, you accompany your girlfriend down the wide, marble walkways of the Arcade, and soon arrive at your destination of the restaurant, 'The Oaken Glade'. Holding open the front door and allowing Nyan to step inside, you follow her through and are immediately met by a smartly-dressed otter-boy, who is quite clearly the establishment's ma√Ætre d'. Looking over at Nyan, he gives her a big, familiar smile, before slightly bowing his head and offering his enthusiastic greetings, [style.speechMasculine(Good evening, good evening! We have not seen you nor your mother for some time, Ms. [nyan.surname], but as ever, you are most welcome here. If you and your partner for this evening would care to follow me, I will show you to your seats. After all, we always have a table for you!)]

#ENDIF

As you follow the waiter to the far side of the restaurant, you see that all of the tables are occupied either by couples or small groups of friends, despite the place always looking empty from the outside. Realising that this aspect of the restaurant's illusion must have been designed to grant diners some privacy, you continue on to the other side of what appears in all respects to be a tranquil forest clearing, where you and Nyan are presented with a quiet corner table for two.

Taking your girlfriend's coat and umbrella, the waiter seats you both at the table and gives you each a menu, before handing you the wine list and telling you to please take your time in ordering. Looking across the table and giving you her most alluring look, Nyan bites her lip and asks, [nyan.speechNoEffects(C-Could we order some white wine, please? I don't mind what bottle, s-so could you please choose for me?)]

Looking down the list, you see that the vintages on offer are of a far higher quality than in an average restaurant, and their steep prices reflect this. As even the cheapest bottle, at [#SPECIAL_PARSE_1] flames, is better than anything which you'd be able to order elsewhere, you decide to go with that one, and tell the waiter that you'd like to order a bottle of [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0].

From the smile on her face, you can tell that Nyan is pleased with your choice of wine, and as she hands her wine list back to the waiter, she happily sighs, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Thanks, [pc.name], I-I've had that wine before, and I really like it...)]

Looking down the list, you see that the vintages on offer are of a far higher quality than in an average restaurant, and their steep prices reflect this. Although not prepared to splash out on the most expensive of the bottles on offer, you do decide to go for something a couple of notches above the cheapest, and so at [#SPECIAL_PARSE_1] flames, you tell the waiter that you'd like to order the bottle of [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0].

From the big smile on her face, you can tell that Nyan is very pleased with your choice of wine, and as she hands her wine list back to the waiter, she happily exclaims, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Thank you, [pc.name]! I-I've had that wine once before, and I really loved it...)]

Looking down the list, you see that the vintages on offer are of a far higher quality than in an average restaurant, and their steep prices reflect this. Deciding that Nyan deserves the very best, you decide to order the most expensive item on the list, and so at [#SPECIAL_PARSE_1] flames, you tell the waiter that you'd like to order the bottle of [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0].

From the ecstatic smile on her face, you can tell that Nyan is delighted with your choice of wine, and as she hands her wine list back to the waiter, she happily squeals, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Thank you so much, [pc.name]! I-I've never had that wine before, but I've heard that it's the very best...)]
Having taken your order, the waiter asks if you'll be sharing the bottle, or if you'll be having something else to drink tonight...

After you've confirmed that you'll be sharing the bottle with Nyan, the waiter leaves your two wine glasses on the table, before swiftly departing and then returning with your chosen vintage. You motion for Nyan to be the one to taste it, and after she's done so and given her enthusiastic approval, the waiter pours you each out a glass. Placing the bottle in an arcane-powered cooler, he leaves it on the table, before saying that he'll return shortly to take your food orders and then swiftly departing once again.

Not wanting to have any alcohol tonight, you tell the waiter that you'd like to order a bottle of water. Nodding his head, he swiftly departs and then returns with your chosen beverages. After giving you a glass and placing your bottled water down on the table, the waiter has Nyan taste the wine you've ordered. Receiving her enthusiastic approval, he then pours her out a glass, before placing the bottle in an arcane-powered cooler and leaving it on the table. Saying that he'll return shortly to take your food orders, he swiftly departs once again, leaving the two of you alone.

Wanting to drink something other than wine, you tell the waiter that you'd like to order a bottle of beer. Nodding his head, he swiftly departs and then returns with your chosen beverages. After expertly pouring out your beer and placing the glass down before you, the waiter has Nyan taste the wine you've ordered. Receiving her enthusiastic approval, he then pours her out a glass, before placing the bottle in an arcane-powered cooler and leaving it on the table. Saying that he'll return shortly to take your food orders, he swiftly departs once again, leaving the two of you alone.

Finally having some time in which to talk with one another, you and Nyan start discussing the food that's on the menu. Visibly relaxing and letting out a happy sigh, Nyan reveals, [nyan.speechNoEffects(You know, I heard that t-the head chef here has actually cooked for Lilith herself. The quality of the f-food here is meant to be unmatched in all of Dominion... A-At least, that's what my mum told me...)]

Looking over the menu, you see that there isn't a very big selection on offer, but if what Nyan has just said is true, you can be sure that you'll like anything which you decide to order. Asking Nyan what she's thinking of having, you're a little taken aback by the speed of her response, as she happily exclaims, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I'm ordering the tsipoura! I-It's the name for oven-baked, gilt-head bream, and it's my a-absolute favourite food ever! I'm so happy that they're serving this...)]

After you've spend a moment in which to decide, you tell Nyan what you're going to order, to which she coyly bites her lip and asks, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Is is ok if I o-order a starter as well? Y-You'll order one too, won't you, [pc.name]?)]

Not wanting your girlfriend to feel awkward at being the only one to order a starter, and being unable to say no to her cute smile, you agree to her demands and ask her what you think you should go for. Happily expressing her opinion on the different starters that are on offer, your girlfriend helps you to decide on what to get. As soon as you've both decided, the waiter swiftly returns and prepares to take your order...

After first letting Nyan order her starter and tsipoura, you tell the waiter what you'd like for your starter and main course. After you're both done, the waiter takes your menus, before swiftly heading off to the kitchen and leaving the two of you alone again.

[nyan.speechNoEffects(This place is amazing, i-isn't it?)] Nyan wistfully sighs. Looking around, you can't help but agree with your girlfriend's sentiment. From a visual perspective, the illusion of being in the middle of a forest clearing is absolutely flawless, and what's more, there's some kind of arcane enchantment that's making the very air your breathe feel as fresh as if you were actually out in the middle of the countryside.

After first letting Nyan order her starter and tsipoura, you tell the waiter what you'd like for your starter and main course. After you're both done, the waiter takes your menus, but before you allow him to leave, you ask if it would be possible to have a candle lit on your table. Giving you a friendly smile, he agrees to fulfil your request, and within moments there's a lit candle on your table, helping to add to the romantic atmosphere.

[nyan.speechNoEffects(That's perfect... Tonight is t-turning out just like I'd hoped it would...)] Nyan happily sighs, before glancing at your surroundings and observing, [nyan.speechNoEffects(This place is amazing...)]

Looking around, you can't help but agree with your girlfriend's sentiment. From a visual perspective, the illusion of being in the middle of a forest clearing is absolutely flawless, and what's more, there's some kind of arcane enchantment that's making the very air your breathe feel as fresh as if you were actually out in the middle of the countryside.

For the next ten minutes, the two of you talk about the restaurant's unique setting, as well as the previous times Nyan has been here. Your conversation doesn't manage to advance very far, however, as the waiter soon arrives at your table to deliver your starters. After checking to make sure that no more drinks are required, the waiter again swiftly departs, leaving Nyan to very quickly turn the topic of conversation to how delicious her food is.

While there's much to say about the exceptional quality of each of your starters, the topic eventually starts to dry up, leaving you to decide what to talk about next...

Deciding that it would be nice for Nyan to simply relax and talk about herself, you ask her how her day has been. Happily engaging you in conversation, the cute cat-girl tells you all about what she's been doing since waking up this morning. As it plays such a large role in her life, the conversation soon naturally advances to the topic of Nyan's work and how her business is going.

Deciding that it would be nice for Nyan to feel good about herself, you offer her a flattering compliment on her good looks, which causes her to blush and shyly smile at you. Clearly being extremely happy with how this evening is going, the cute cat-girl tells you how much fun she's having, which then leads into a conversation about how her day has been. As it plays such a large role in her life, the topic then soon advances to be about Nyan's work and how her business is going.

Deciding that you want Nyan to know just how much she turns you on, you make several dirty suggestions about what you'd like to do with her later, making it quite clear that you're wanting to get into her panties tonight. Furiously blushing, the embarrassed cat-girl frowns at you and firmly asks you to not say such outrageous things again. Not wanting to ruin this evening, you decide to switch to engaging your girlfriend in small talk, and you soon manage to get Nyan talking about work and how her business is going.

By this time the two of you have finished your starters, and after the waiter has come to take your empty plates away, Nyan continues on the topic of her business, and reveals, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Y-You know, my store was actually one of my mum's businesses, and she gave it to me to t-try and help me build my confidence... I've been trying r-really hard to overcome my anxiety since then, as I really want to make her happy.)]

Happily smiling at you, Nyan gazes lovingly at you with her big, blue eyes and reveals what you've already started to notice, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Since meeting you, I-I've starting to feel a lot more confident about things. I don't get so caught up on m-my words like I used to either...)]

Telling your girlfriend that you're happy to hear that she's really starting to overcome her anxiety and confidence issues, you say that her mother is sure to be proud of her efforts. Still smiling, Nyan nervously rubs her hands together and responds by saying, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I really hope so... My mum's a super successful b-businesswoman, and so I worry that I'll never live up to h-her expectations... She's been travelling all over the Realm d-doing business for over a year now, and I-I can't wait to see her again. She's so amazing, I really want to be like her, b-but I find it difficult to be around people...)]

As you continue your conversation with Nyan, you find it extremely difficult to get her to talk about anything but her mother, and you very quickly get the clear impression that your girlfriend practically worships her mum. Eventually, however, the cat-girl's praise of her mother is brought to an end not by your efforts, but by the arrival of your main meals.

After the waiter has delivered your food and swiftly departed, both you and Nyan start to eat, giving you a brief moment in which to think of what to say next in order to steer the topic away from her mother...

It being the most obvious thing to talk about, you ask Nyan if she's enjoying her food, to which you receive an extremely enthusiastic, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Yes, it's s-so amazing! Tsipoura is my favourite food ever!)]

Wanting to have some fun with Nyan, you start gently flirting with her and complimenting her appearance, which causes her to furiously blush and let out an excited giggle. She really seems to really be having fun with you, and even manages to summon the courage to flirt back with you a little.

Eager to have some physical contact with your girlfriend, you slide your [pc.foot] up her leg and tell her that you can't wait to fuck her. Furiously blushing at your bold move, the embarrassed cat-girl swats your [pc.leg] away and stutters, [nyan.speechNoEffects(P-Please, [pc.name], d-don't do such outrageous t-things here!)]

Having successfully steered Nyan away from talking about her mother, you allow the topic of conversation to turn towards you. While you don't want to cause Nyan any distress by telling her all of the details, you do reveal that Lilaya is your [lilaya.relation(pc)], and that you're helping her to conduct arcane research.

[nyan.speechNoEffects(L-Lilaya? As in, Lyssieth's daughter?)] Nyan asks, and after you've replied in the affirmative, she gasps, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Wow... So you're related to an elder lilin? M-My mother has met with Lyssieth quite a lot to do business, and so I've heard a l-lot about her and Lilaya...)]

After finishing your meals, the two of you continue to discuss your [lilaya.relation(pc)] for a short while, and you discover that by accompanying her mother on one of her business trips, Nyan has actually met Lilaya once before. As you remark upon the fact that it's a small world, the waiter suddenly returns to take your plates away. After quickly carrying out his task, he asks if you or Nyan would like to see the dessert menu. Upon hearing this, your girlfriend puts on one of the cutest looks you've ever seen, and you find yourself unable to resist giving her what she wants...

Seeing the excited look on Nyan's face, and not wanting to let her down, you tell the waiter that you would like to order some dessert. After retrieving and presenting you with the menu, the waiter steps back, giving the two of you some time in which to decide. Quickly settling on what it is that you'll order, you ask your girlfriend what she'd like, to which she replies, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Oh, erm, I'd like ice cream...)]

Relaying your orders to the waiter, you once again engage Nyan in small talk, and from her relaxed, happy demeanour, you can tell that she's completely at ease while in your presence. Despite being in a public place, she's so relaxed that her stutter has almost completely disappeared, and after your desserts have arrived, she barely takes her eyes away from you as she tucks into her ice cream. Humming in delight, she sighs, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I haven't had this much fun in a long time... Thanks, [pc.name]...)]

Smiling and telling her that it's your pleasure, you see that your girlfriend is beginning to gaze at you in a deeply affectionate manner. Seizing this opportunity, you finish your dessert and start to flirt with her, and from her eager responses and happy little giggles, you can soon tell that she's going to want more than just kiss tonight.

Seeing the excited look on Nyan's face, and not wanting to let her down, you tell the waiter that you would like to order some dessert. After retrieving and presenting you with the menu, the waiter steps back, giving the two of you some time in which to decide. Thinking that it would be a nice experience, you ask your girlfriend if she'd like to share a dessert with you, to which she happily replies, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Oh, yes! Could we please share some ice cream?)]

Relaying Nyan's choice to the waiter, you once again engage her in small talk, and from her relaxed, happy demeanour, you can tell that she's completely at ease while in your presence. Despite being in a public place, she's so relaxed that her stutter has almost completely disappeared, and after your ice cream has arrived, she barely takes her eyes away from you as she joins you in tucking into the frozen dessert. Humming in delight, she sighs, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I haven't had this much fun in a long time... This is just like in my books... Thanks, [pc.name]...)]

Smiling and telling her that it's your pleasure, you see that your girlfriend is beginning to gaze at you in a deeply affectionate manner. Seizing this opportunity, you finish your dessert and start to flirt with her, and from her eager responses and happy little giggles, you can soon tell that she's going to want more than just kiss tonight.

With your desserts finished, and with both of you being ready to leave, you call over the waiter and ask for the bill. Swiftly doing as you ask, he presents you with tonight's cost, and you see that you're being charged an eye-watering [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] flames...

After you've quickly settled the bill, the waiter retrieves Nyan's coat and umbrella, before seeing the two of you to the door and thanking you for your business. As you [pc.step] out into the Shopping Arcade, Nyan performs an uncharacteristic move, and boldly initiates physical contact by taking hold of your [pc.wing] and leaning into your body. Letting out a happy little giggle, she exclaims, [nyan.speechNoEffects(That was so fun, [pc.name]! Thank you so much!)]

#IF(game.getCurrentWeather()==WEATHER_MAGIC_STORM)

Returning your girlfriend's sentiments, you accompany her to the exit of the Shopping Arcade, where you see through the glass doors that there's an ongoing arcane storm. Letting out a little eek, Nyan huddles up to you and whines, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Oh no... Perhaps if we hurry, it won't affect me too much...)]

Doing as the cat-girl suggests, the two of you wait for the next clap of thunder to pass before hurrying outside and down the street towards her apartment. By a stroke of particularly good fortune, you manage to avoid both strikes of thunder and horny citizens during your dash towards Nyan's home. As you reach the steps of her apartment building, however, the storm above makes up for its unusual silence by unleashing one of the most powerful claps of arcane thunder you've ever heard.

Despite pulling her through the entrance and slamming the door shut behind you, you're not able to save Nyan from the arousing effects of the storm, and before you know what's happening, the cat-girl is frantically pressing her [nyan.lips+] against your mouth and lustfully grinding herself against your body. Protected from any further claps of thunder, Nyan soon starts to come back to her senses, and with a little eek, she breaks off the kiss and exclaims, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I'm sorry, [pc.name]! I-I couldn't stop myself!)]

Telling her that there's nothing to be sorry about, you reassuringly stroke Nyan's arm, which has the desired effect of calming her down. Making your way up the flights of stairs to the third floor, the two of you soon arrive at the door to your girlfriend's apartment, where she turns to face you and nervously shuffles her feet, before looking at you with her big, blue eyes and saying, [nyan.speechNoEffects(P-Please, I'd like you to come in for a while...)]

#ELSE #IF(game.getCurrentWeather()==WEATHER_RAIN || game.getCurrentWeather()==WEATHER_SNOW)

Returning your girlfriend's sentiments, you accompany her to the exit of the Shopping Arcade, where you see through the glass doors that it's currently #IF(game.getCurrentWeather()==WEATHER_RAIN) raining outside. #ELSE snowing outside. #ENDIF Letting out an embarrassed little whine, Nyan pops open her cute frog-umbrella and offers, [nyan.speechNoEffects(This is big enough for both of us... So we can walk close together and share it...)]

Thanking your girlfriend for her kindness, you do as she suggests and share the umbrella with her. Talking with your blushing girlfriend about this evening's meal, you head down the street in the direction of her apartment.

#ELSE

Returning your girlfriend's sentiments, you accompany her to the exit of the Shopping Arcade, where you see that the lack of precipitation renders Nyan's umbrella unnecessary. Talking with your girlfriend about this evening's meal, you head down the street in the direction of her apartment.

#ENDIF

After five minutes, you arrive at the entrance to Nyan's apartment building, and after [pc.walking] up the steps, you push open the front door and accompany your girlfriend into the lobby. Making your way up the flights of stairs to the third floor, the two of you soon arrive at the door to Nyan's apartment, where she turns to face you and nervously shuffles her feet, before looking at you with her big, blue eyes and saying, [nyan.speechNoEffects(P-Please, I'd like you to come in for a while...)]

#ENDIF

Happily accepting Nyan's invitation to come inside, you follow her into her apartment's hallway. Pulling off her shoes and hanging up her coat, the cute cat-girl turns towards you and breathlessly pants, [nyan.speechNoEffects([pc.Name]... I really had a great time tonight... Perhaps we could...)]

Letting her sentence trail off, your girlfriend reveals just how horny she is by leaning forwards and desperately pressing her [nyan.lips+] against your mouth. With Nyan's hot body pressing against yours, and with the delicate scent of her perfume in the air, you find yourself getting just as turned on as she is, and without wasting even a second, you take hold of her and start passionately returning her kiss.

After several moments spent entwined in one another's embrace, Nyan momentarily pulls back, before letting out an erotic little moan and suggesting, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Let's go to the lounge...)]

With her arms still wrapped around your back, Nyan continues kissing and grinding up against you as she shuffles along towards her lounge. Knocking the door open with her butt, she giggles and moans, [nyan.speechNoEffects(~Mmm!~ Yes, [pc.name]! ~Mmm!~ Come on...)]

Still passionately kissing one another, you and Nyan enter her lounge, but as you do so, you have a suddenly moment of clarity in which you realise that all of the lights in her apartment are already turned on. At that same moment, you notice out of the corner of your eye that there's an unfamiliar figure leaning back on the sofa furthest from the door. Before you have a chance to react, this stranger calls out in a mature, feminine voice, [nyanmum.speech(Well, well, well. I didn't know you had a thing for [pc.racePlural]...)]
